title: Why is the basic Karma bundle more expensive than usual?
body:
**Karma's bundle:**
Karma
Skin (1350)
Icon
Border

_Price: 2000_

**Nidalee's Bundle:**
Nidalee
Skin (1350)
Icon
Border

_Price: 1900_

______________________

Yeah, it's for charity, I know.  Cool, that's really nice. Very generous.
But why is it more expensive?

100% of the proceeds are going to charity anyway, so why does it need an extra charge? Are we paying more for the privilege of it being a charity skin?

Don't get me wrong, of course I'm happy to support charity with my purchase, I think thats great!  _(I've bought every charity skin/icon etc. to date, even the ones I didn't want and don't use.)_ But I still do want to know what I'm paying for.
What is that extra 100 RP for?  If there is a valid reason for it _(I.e. covering the cost of transferring the money to the charity, or legal fees etc.)_ I'm happy to pay, but if it's just randomly tacked on _'just cos we can get more than usual from you cos it's charity.'_ then that's underhanded and goes against the principles of charity in the first place, and I'm not so comfortable supporting that kind of attitude.


_(This is not a rhetorical question btw, I would really like an answer here please.  What is the extra 100RP for?)_
Thank you
